summary: A thief is betrayed after a well done job in Detroit. Returning to Chicago, he decides on revenge. Things escalate.
cast: Mark Adair-Rios|Khandi Alexander|Erich Anderson|Cecil 'Shuckey Duckey' Armstrong|Tom Babuscio|Alec Baldwin|Reginald Ballard|Richard Beatty|Eric Bizot|Andre Braugher|Lisette Bross|David Byrd|Louis Crugnali|Sandra Cusimano|Michelle Davison|Julia Sweeney|Rebecca De Mornay|Richard Edson|Greg Wayne Elam|Bradford English|Van Epperson|Terrence Evans|Tom Everett|Gichi Gamba|Janeane Garofalo|Elliot Goldwag|Bruce Greenwood|Ricky Harris|Michael Hitchcock|Michael Jace|Jack McGee|Robert Miano|Gavin Polone|Ralph Price|Nicole Pulliam|Jaime B. Rotman|Al Sapienza|Ben Shenkman|Nathan Dean|Martin Charles Warner|Big Daddy Wayne|Michael Jai White|Cynthia Zoller|Brian Freifield
title: Entre ladrones
